comments.text: Interesting article on underwater welding – directly relevant to building and maintaining undersea habitats.  The advancements in wet welding techniques are crucial for the longevity and structural integrity of any underwater structure, especially considering the harsh corrosive environment.  This speaks to the practical challenges of my long-term goal of building an underwater city.
